sports-director.headline: Quickly set season schedules
sports-director.body: For each of your teams, Sportomatic allows you to easily specify their entire season's schedule with only a few clicks.

sports-director.headline: Manage staff effectively
sports-director.body: You will be able to track your coaches' punctuality and absenteeism, and even log their hours so that wages can be automatically generated through the system.

sports-director.headline: Keep results in one place
sports-director.body: Managers and coaches will be able to log scores at events, which you can see as it's happening no matter where you are.

sports-director.headline: Understand how to improve
sports-director.body: Sportomatic tracks vital statistics about your staff, teams and players. You'll know which coaches are always late, which athletes never attend practice and which teams are crushing their competition.

sports-director.headline: Everyone's always on the same page
sports-director.body: Every manager, coach, athlete, parent and supporter in your community will have real-time access to all the changes they need to know about.

team-manager.headline: Maintain high-quality coaches
team-manager.body: Sign coaches in and out, or mark them absent, with the tap of a button. Finding a replacement coach is just as simple. You'll know who's always late or never even shows up.

team-manager.headline: Easily take attendance
team-manager.body: When practice starts you can easily tick players off as they arrive. Each player will have attendance scores for the season. It's about time you left that clipboard at home.

team-manager.headline: Track improvement
team-manager.body: You'll be able to see how your team is performing in key metrics over time. This can help you decide if you need to switch tactics, or maybe make a more drastic change.

coach.headline: Get paid fairly and on time
coach.body: Through Sportomatic, your wages can be automatically generated. You'll always know exactly how much you're owed and there's no excuse for missing pay day.

coach.headline: Always know where to be
coach.body: Miscommunication is a thing of the past. Any time a practice is canceled or a match is moved later, you'll know instantly and can plan your life accordingly.

coach.headline: See the effects of training
coach.body: You're able to track your team's performance over time in key metrics, so you know if you need to do the passing or shooting drill next practice.

athlete.headline: Track your team's performance
athlete.body: You will always know how well your team is doing, and what your team is struggling with. You can use this info to become more competitive.

athlete.headline: Never miss a practice
athlete.body: It can be difficult to always know where to be, what time to be there, what to bring, etc. Not anymore. Now you'll always have all of that info right in your pocket at all times.

parent.headline: Know where your kid needs to be
parent.body: You'll always have all the info you need for your kid's schedule; date, time, venue, opponents, etc. As changes happen, you will be instantly notified.

parent.headline: All your kid's results in one place
parent.body: Even when you're stuck at the office, you'll immediately know if your daughter won the tennis match she's been talking about all week.

supporter.headline: Attend your favourite team's games
supporter.body: You will be able to see the schedule for their entire season, including times, venues, opponents and more. True supporters never miss a game.

supporter.headline: Follow results closely
supporter.body: You will immediately be able to see if your team won or lost today's game, and view their results history for the season. We've even thrown some bonus stats for the superfan.
